meanings.definition: A person or company that provides a service.
meanings.sent1: The friendly servicer fixed my computer quickly.
meanings.sent2: The servicer delivered fresh groceries to our door.
meanings.sent3: The servicer joked that fixing the leaky faucet was his specialty.
meanings.sent4: She was a servicer of smiles, brightening everyone's day.
meanings.sent5: The diligent servicer always went the extra mile to help customers.

meanings.definition: The act of serving or providing a service.
meanings.sent1: Her servicer at the restaurant was exceptional.
meanings.sent2: The servicer at the hotel made sure guests were comfortable.
meanings.sent3: The servicer of ice cream accidentally dropped a scoop on his shoe.
meanings.sent4: Kindness is the servicer that makes the world a better place.
meanings.sent5: The servicer of knowledge shared valuable insights with the students.
